problemTypes.label: Unnecessary `@Autowired`
problemTypes.description: Unnecessary `@Autowired` over the only constructor

problemTypes.label: public `@Bean` method
problemTypes.description: Public modifier on `@Bean` method. They no longer have to be public visibility to be usable by Spring.

problemTypes.label: Unnecessary `@SpringExtension`
problemTypes.description: `@SpringBootTest` and all test slice annotations already applies `@SpringExtension` as of Spring Boot 2.1.0.

problemTypes.label: Use constructor parameter injection
problemTypes.description: Use constructor parameter injection

problemTypes.label: Use precise mapping annotation, i.e. '@GetMapping', '@PostMapping', etc.
problemTypes.description: Use precise mapping annotation, i.e. '@GetMapping', '@PostMapping', etc.

problemTypes.label: Unnecessary `@Repository`
problemTypes.description: Unnecessary `@Repository`

problemTypes.label: Switch to Lambda DSL syntax
problemTypes.description: Consider switching to Lambda DSL syntax

problemTypes.label: Missing '@Configuration'
problemTypes.description: Class likely missing '@Configuration' annotation, i.e. has Bean methods but no '@Configuration' annotation

problemTypes.label: Usage of old 'HttpSecurity.authroizeRequests(...)' API
problemTypes.description: 'HttpSecurity.authroizeRequests(...)' API and related classes are to be deprecated use new `authorizeHttpRequests(...) and related classes

problemTypes.label: Replace usage of 'WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter' as this class to be removed in Security 6.x
problemTypes.description: 'WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter' is removed in Spring-Security 6.x. Refactor classes extending the 'WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter' into 'Configuration' beans and methods into 'Bean' definitions

problemTypes.label: Invalid Domain ID Type for Spring Data Repository
problemTypes.description: Invalid Domain ID type for Spring Data Repository

problemTypes.label: Implicit web annotations names
problemTypes.description: Web annotation names are unnecessary when it is the same as method parameter name

problemTypes.label: Type not supported as of Spring Boot 3
problemTypes.description: Type no supported as of Spring Boot 3

problemTypes.label: Spring factories key not supported
problemTypes.description: Spring factories key not supported

problemTypes.label: Modulith restricted type reference
problemTypes.description: Modulith restricted type reference

problemTypes.label: Not precise bean defintion type
problemTypes.description: Bean definition should have precise type

problemTypes.label: 'BeanPostProcessor' behaviour is ignored in AOT
problemTypes.description: 'BeanPostProcessor' behaviour is ignored

problemTypes.label: Not registered as a Bean
problemTypes.description: Not registered as Bean

problemTypes.label: Invalid bean navigation
problemTypes.description: Accessing a 'bean property' in a type that doesn't have properties (e.g. like String or Integer)

problemTypes.label: Invalid indexed navigation
problemTypes.description: Accessing a property using [] in a type that doesn't support that

problemTypes.label: Expected dot or lbrack
problemTypes.description: Unexpected character found where a '.' or '[' was expected

problemTypes.label: No matching rbrack
problemTypes.description: Found a '[' but no matching ']'

problemTypes.label: Non integer in brackets
problemTypes.description: Use of [..] navigation with non-integer value

problemTypes.description: Expecting a value of a certain type, but value doesn't parse as such

problemTypes.label: Invalid bean property
problemTypes.description: Accessing a named property in a type that doesn't provide a property accessor with that name

problemTypes.description: Property-key not found in any configuration metadata on the project's classpath
